translation.en: What are you doing, Bean? I'm making the Pit of Doom.
translation.fr: - Que fais-tu, Juju ? - Le Trou de la mort.

translation.en: It's a deadly trap for catching really dangerous things.
translation.fr: Un piège mortel pour attraper des choses très dangereuses.

translation.en: Wanna help? It'll be fun. We just want the dirt.
translation.fr: - Vous m'aidez ? Ce sera amusant. - On veut la terre.

translation.en: Lots and lots of dirt.
Fine, take some.
But not too much. I know how you guys work.
translation.fr: Mais pas trop. Je vous connais.

translation.en: Pinch of lilac.
Strand of hair dark as night.
translation.fr: Des cheveux noirs comme la nuit.

translation.en: Toe of dead frog?
translation.fr: SORT D'INVISIBILITÉ Un orteil de grenouille morte ? Je peux m'en passer.

translation.en: Maybe I don't need that.
translation.fr: Un orteil de grenouille morte ? Je peux m'en passer.

translation.en: Clear as water.
Light as air.
Circle three times.
The first with care.
Ivy! I'm starting breakfast. Coming!
Though you won't see me.
translation.fr: Mais tu ne me verras pas.

translation.en: Three steps forward.
Fourth, if you dare.
Look straight to the glass. You will not be there.
translation.fr: Et face au miroir, le vide prendra la pose.

translation.en: Yes! Yes!
Invisibility is mine!
Wondrous!
Hey. Pancakes sound good, or is it more of a waffles- for- the- weekend thing?
translation.fr: Salut. Des pancakes ? Ou tu préfères des gaufres ?

translation.en: You can see me?
Yes. Is that the right answer?
I guess I do need a frog.
Bean's pit isn't gonna catch anything.
translation.fr: Le trou de Juju n'attrapera rien.

translation.en: Yeah, trapping pits are normally rectangular.
- Yeah. - Yeah.
Bean should stick to sandcastles.  Yeah.
translation.fr: Elle devrait faire des châteaux de sable.

translation.en: - Hey, Bean- breath! - Breakfast! Come in.
Like, now.
Mom said.
Here's your breakfast!
Ew, ew! Get those worms away.
translation.fr: Voilà ton petit-déjeuner. - Enlève ces vers. - Tu m'aides à creuser ?

translation.en: Wanna help make the Pit of Doom?
translation.fr: - Enlève ces vers. - Tu m'aides à creuser ?

translation.en: It's gonna be awesomer than that cave we made. I do not play make- believe in the dirt anymore.
translation.fr: - C'est mieux que notre grotte. - Je joue plus à ça, maintenant.

translation.en: Well, you do play make- believe that you're a grown- up.
translation.fr: Mais tu joues à la grande.

translation.en: Just because you're 12 doesn't make you the boss of me, Nancy.
translation.fr: Tu as 12 ans, mais tu ne peux pas me donner d'ordres.

translation.en: - Little sisters are so annoying! -
Over here.
Leo! You have to come over after breakfast!
We have to finish the Pit of Doom today, okay?
translation.fr: Faut finir le Trou de la mort aujourd'hui.

translation.en: - - What?
I said you have to come over after breakfast and finish the--
translation.fr: Passe après le petit-déjeuner pour finir le…

translation.en: Sorry, Mrs. Trantz. It was an accident.
translation.fr: Désolée, Mme Trantz. C'était un accident.

translation.en: Accidents are what happen when little children don't behave.
translation.fr: Ça arrive aux enfants qui font des bêtises.

translation.en: Dottsy! Do not let Bernice Blue interrupt your tinkle time.
translation.fr: Dottsy. Ne laisse pas Bernice Blue interrompre ta commission.

translation.en: Oh- hoo- hoo! You did it! Ooh! It's a good one too.
translation.fr: Bravo ! Et tu n'as pas fait semblant.

translation.en: Aw. Yeah.
We don't like children. Do we, Dottsy?
translation.fr: On n'aime pas les enfants. Hein, Dottsy ?

translation.en: We don't because they're yucky and mucky and icky, icky, icky.
translation.fr: Parce qu'ils sont dégoûtants, répugnants et gluants.

translation.en: All right, my baby. Okay, let's do this.
Just remember, I have your mother's phone number.
translation.fr: N'oublie pas, j'ai le numéro de ta mère.

translation.en: Bean! Breakfast!
I have to take the girls shopping later. Wanna come?
translation.fr: On va faire les boutiques. - Tu veux venir ? - Tu disais ?

translation.en: La, la, la. Were you saying something?
Do you want to take the girls shopping?
translation.fr: - Tu veux venir ? - Tu disais ? Tu emmènes les filles ?

translation.en: Sorry, I can't hear you, so I probably can't help.
translation.fr: J'entends pas, je peux pas t'aider.

translation.en: Mom, there's a place that does ear- piercing right by where we're shopping today.
translation.fr: On peut se faire percer les oreilles au centre commercial.

translation.en: Not happening.
If Mrs. Trantz calls, it was an accident. Again, Bean?
translation.fr: - C'était un accident avec Mme Trantz. - Encore ?

translation.en: Hey, Dad, Leo and me are going to finish the Pit of Doom today.
translation.fr: Moi et Leo allons finir le Trou de la mort.

translation.en: - - Leo and I. Subject pronoun.
Hello, Mrs. Trantz.
She is out of control.
Do you mean my pit? The one I was digging for the tree?
Yes! It's in case any bears or bad guys come into our yard.
translation.fr: Oui ! Pour piéger les ours ou les méchants.

translation.en: They'll fall in and be trapped.
You actually think you're gonna catch a bear? And then what?
translation.fr: Tu penses attraper un ours ? Et après ?

translation.en: I could train her and take her to this week's show- and- tell.
translation.fr: Je le dresserai et l'emmènerai à l'école.

translation.en: Well, if I were you, I'd be sure to consider the standing height of your average grizzly.
translation.fr: Prends en compte la taille d'un grizzly debout.

translation.en: So you know how deep to dig the pit.
No.
Oh, yeah!
Yes, Bean does get distracted. - I don't know where she gets it from. - Yeah!
translation.fr: Oui, Juju est tête en l'air. J'ignore de qui elle tient ça.

translation.en: Come on, Nancy. Show us how it's done.
Nancy?
That's our rule. We hear the music, and we have to dance.
translation.fr: C'est la règle. Si on entend la musique, on danse.

translation.en: Grow up. The rules have changed.
translation.fr: Grandis un peu. Les règles ont changé.

translation.en: Remember?
You signed it.
Your mother never let you? Really?
My mother would never have…
Be kind.
Tell the truth.
Listen to others.
No name- calling, and no playing tricks.
translation.fr: Politesse et pas de mauvais tours.

translation.en: - - And no slurping your cereal.
No being gross on purpose.
Sometimes being gross on purpose is useful.
translation.fr: Parfois, être dégoûtant peut avoir son utilité.

translation.en: You know that if you break three rules in one day, that's it.
translation.fr: Si tu enfreins trois règles en un jour, c'est fini.

translation.en: Serious consequences.
You… are infuriating!
- Yes. Yes. Bye. - Oh, hey, Bean. Bean. Bean.
translation.fr: Oui. Au revoir. Juju. Évite de te salir aujourd'hui, car…

translation.en: - Try to stay clean today because-- -
translation.fr: Juju. Évite de te salir aujourd'hui, car…

translation.en: You and I are taking Nancy shopping in a bit for school clothes.
translation.fr: On fait les boutiques avec Ninon pour l'école.

translation.en: - You might wanna get something too. - No!
translation.fr: - On t'achètera des tenues aussi. - Non !

translation.en: Yes, that's your child.
Any plans for today?  I'll be here doing research.
translation.fr: - Des projets pour aujourd'hui ? - Je vais rechercher

translation.en: I need to find a frog. Oh, like one for a pet?
translation.fr: - une grenouille. - Un animal de compagnie ?

translation.en: More like one that's old and getting ready to donate his body to science and/or magic.
translation.fr: Qui soit prête à faire don de son corps pour la science ou la magie.

translation.en: Oh, I'd love to donate my body to magic.
translation.fr: J'adorerais faire ça pour la magie.

translation.en: Well, um, frogs, I hear, are found outside.
So come and get some fresh air. Outside.
You know, that girl across the street, she seems nice.
Wouldn't you wanna join them? Make a new friend? - - Bean?
translation.fr: - Tu veux t'en faire une amie ? - De Juju ?

translation.en: No thanks.  What's wrong with Bean?
translation.fr: - Sans façon. - Quel est le souci ?

translation.en: She just runs around and makes noise.
translation.fr: Elle a la bougeotte et elle est bruyante.

translation.en: Well, why do you say that?
- I can make more noise than you! -
translation.fr: Je fais plus de bruit que toi !

translation.en: Okay. But, you know, you don't even really know her yet.
translation.fr: D'accord. Mais tu ne la connais pas encore.

translation.en: Who knows? You might change your mind. I won't change my mind.
translation.fr: - Qui sait, tu pourrais changer d'avis. - Non.

translation.en: One thing I do know about Bean is she has no imagination.
translation.fr: Une chose est sûre, Juju n'a pas d'imagination.

translation.en: I tiptoed up to the edge of the Pit of Doom,
translation.fr: J'ai approché en douce du Trou de la mort

translation.en: and there was this kind of snuffling sound below.
translation.fr: et j'ai entendu un reniflement venant du fond.

translation.en: At first, I thought it was Leo with a bad cold,
translation.fr: J'ai cru que c'était Leo enrhumé,

translation.en: but when I looked in…
There it was.
It's humongous!
That's not gonna happen, Bean.
The only thing that's going to fall in this pit is you.
translation.fr: La seule chose qui tombera dans ce trou, c'est toi.

translation.en: - - Hey! Watch the cleats. I have a game this afternoon.
translation.fr: Fais gaffe à mes crampons. J'ai un match de prévu.

translation.en: Why would you want to play something you have to stay clean for?
translation.fr: C'est pas un jeu si tu dois rester propre.

translation.en: I like the uniform.
I'm gonna get you!
A perfect neighborhood is one without leaves or children.
translation.fr: Un quartier parfait est un quartier sans feuilles ni enfants.

translation.en: Isn't that right, Dottsy?
Hey, babe.
- Oh, thank you. - Uh- huh.
Remember when it felt that easy? Everything was so… under control.
translation.fr: Tu te rappelles quand c'était facile ? Quand on contrôlait la situation.

translation.en: You mean, back when we had just one kid?
It was nice.
- Now, two kids. - Mm. - Double the learning experience. -
translation.fr: Deux enfants. On apprend deux fois plus.

translation.en: - Yeah, well… - What do you think we'll be learning about today?
translation.fr: Oui… Et que crois-tu qu'on apprendra aujourd'hui ?

translation.en: I'm gonna get you! - Get away from me! -
- Bean! - Get away from me!
Just wanna wash your uniform for you!
- No! No!  -
Sorry. Sorry. Sorry.
You! You! You!
Mrs. Trantz?
- Oh! I… - I can help you.
All right, handsy! - Dottsy! Come back to mama. -
translation.fr: Bas les pattes ! Dottsy ! Viens voir maman.

translation.en: Ow, ow, ow! Don't trip.
Dottsy!
You and I have different interpretations of clean.
translation.fr: Toi et moi n'avons pas la même définition de la propreté.

translation.en: I am clean, mostly.
- - The water just washed off all the dirt.
Mine.
- - Mom!
I'm ready.
Bean, as a favor to me and my sanity,
translation.fr: Je t'en prie, pour ma santé mentale,

translation.en: go inside, take a shower, and put on something clean.
translation.fr: va prendre une douche et change de tenue.

translation.en: Please don't make me go, Mom.
- Shopping sucks my bones. -
Mom, I think red makes my eyes pop.
translation.fr: Le rouge fait ressortir mes yeux.

translation.en: What color says, I value my education? Bean, don't lie on the floor.
translation.fr: Quelle couleur pour paraître plus sérieuse ? Juju, lève-toi.

translation.en: Please, can we leave? This is taking forever.
translation.fr: On peut rentrer ? C'est trop long.

translation.en: What do you think?
I think it's gonna be night soon, which means burglars and bears.
translation.fr: C'est bientôt la nuit, l'heure des cambrioleurs et des ours.

translation.en: Bean, get off the floor.
Please, I wanna get home and dig the pit before it's too late.
translation.fr: Je veux rentrer et finir mon trou tant qu'il est temps.

translation.en: It's hard, and nobody's helping.
translation.fr: - Personne ne m'aide. - J'ai une idée.

translation.en: I have an idea. Why don't you ask the new girl?
translation.fr: - Personne ne m'aide. - J'ai une idée. - Demande à la voisine. - Zoé ?

translation.en: - Ivy? - Yes.
translation.fr: - Demande à la voisine. - Zoé ? Oui.

translation.en: She seems nice.
Nice is boring.
She wears headbands. Why do you think Ivy's boring?
translation.fr: - Elle porte des serre-têtes. - Rasoir, pourquoi ?

translation.en: Because she is. All she does is read.
translation.fr: Parce que. Elle passe son temps à lire.

translation.en: At recess, Mom. She reads at recess.
translation.fr: À la récré. Elle lit à la récré.

translation.en: Well, Ivy just moved here, Bean. She probably doesn't have friends yet.
translation.fr: Zoé vient d'arriver ici. Elle n'a pas d'amis.

translation.en: I think I'll get it.
Hmm. I think this hem's a little short.
Okay. Right here.
What? What is this? Okay.
translation.fr: Quoi ? C'est quoi, ce truc ? Bien.

translation.en: - Bean, what are you doing? - Nothing. Nothing. Nothing. Nothing. Nothing.
- Mom? - Hmm?
It's kinda expensive.
Am I getting extra clothes allowance? Now that I'm not a kid anymore.
translation.fr: Tu me rallonges mon argent de poche ?

translation.en: Oh, for the love of Betsy, just get the dang skirt!
translation.fr: Pour l'amour de Betsy, prends-la, cette jupe !

translation.en: Don't be such a tightwad. What did you call me?
translation.fr: - Fais pas ta pince. - Tu m'as traitée de quoi ?

translation.en: Where on Earth did you hear that?
Grandma. Who's Betsy?
It's just an expression. Calling someone a tightwad is rude, Bean.
translation.fr: C'est une expression. Traiter quelqu'un de pince, c'est malpoli.

translation.en: Apologize to Nancy, please.
Yeah. Apologize.
I'm sorry you're such a tightwad.
translation.fr: Désolée que tu sois une pince.

translation.en: can you behave for ten minutes?
- Please. -
Wouldn't pierced ears look great with my hair like this?
Nice try.
Let's trick the tightwad.
Come on, Nancy.
Take the bait.
Very funny, Bean.
I am not Bean.
I am the ghost of Mr. Killop.
translation.fr: Mais le fantôme de M. Killop.

translation.en: I can see your pants.
I lived in this house until I died of bad breath and busted boils.
translation.fr: Ma mauvaise haleine et mes furoncles ont eu raison de moi.

translation.en: So I haunt the bush in front of it.
Get out of there, Bean.  Stay away!
Or in the dark of night, icy fingers will wrap around your neck.
translation.fr: Ou au cœur de la nuit, une main glacée te saisira la gorge.

translation.en: Help!
Let go!
My tiny delicate bone.
You broke my arm.
I did not.
You okay?
- - I didn't mean to.
Fooled ya! Silly big sister!
I got you!
Nope.
I got you.
You know the rules.
Three strikes, you're out.
I didn't break three rules. You called me a tightwad.
translation.fr: - Rien du tout. - Tu m'as traitée de pince.

translation.en: That breaks rule one. Be kind.
Two, you tried to trick me with fake money.
translation.fr: Tu as voulu me piéger avec ce faux billet.

translation.en: No playing tricks.
Three, you just lied about your arm being broken.
translation.fr: Et tu as menti en disant que ton bras était cassé.

translation.en: No lying.
There's four. You wiggled your butt.
translation.fr: Et 4e infraction. Tu as gigoté du popotin.

translation.en: And five and six.
But it doesn't even matter because you're already gonna face serious consequences.
translation.fr: Mais aucune importance, car tu vas en subir les conséquences.

translation.en: Oh, yeah? See if I care.
And I'm not getting consequences in my face because I'm running away.
translation.fr: Je ne subirai rien du tout, car je m'en vais.

translation.en: Mom! - Mom! -
- Mom! - And you'll never ever find me!
Not even if you hire a detective.
- What? What? What? -
I don't know. And she was reeling it into the bush,
and then I pulled her out, and she turned around, and she wiggled her butt at me…
translation.fr: je l'en ai sortie, elle a gigoté son popotin…

translation.en: Follow me.
Come to my backyard. If you dare.
translation.fr: Viens dans mon jardin. Si tu oses.

translation.en: The coast is clear.
But from here on in, you have to put on this.
translation.fr: Mais à partir de maintenant, tu dois mettre ça.

translation.en: Why?
Because it's a secret passageway.
No peeking.
Do everything I say so you won't get hurt.
translation.fr: Fais ce que je dis, et tu ne te feras pas mal.

translation.en: - Run! -
You can look now.
You've run away.
- Persephone, say hello to Bean. - Bonjour, Bean.
It's my secret garden. Did you read that book?
translation.fr: C'est mon jardin secret. Tu as lu ce livre ?

translation.en: I'll bring lots of food and blankets. I'm only running away until dinner.
translation.fr: - J'apporte à manger. - Je rentrerai pour le dîner.

translation.en: What's the puddle for?
It's not a puddle. It's a pond. A frog pond.
translation.fr: C'est une mare, une mare à grenouilles.

translation.en: A pond for a guppy maybe. If I was a frog, I don't think I'd want to live there.
translation.fr: À guppy. Si j'étais une grenouille, je ne viendrais pas là.

translation.en: But would you wanna die there?
Wouldn't you get in trouble if your mom found out I was hiding here,
translation.fr: Tu n'auras pas d'ennuis si ta mère apprend que je suis là

translation.en: and it was your idea?
No.
I forgot, kids like you don't get in trouble. I do too!
translation.fr: - Une enfant comme toi n'a pas d'ennuis. - Si.

translation.en: For what? Reading books? You can't get in trouble for reading.
translation.fr: Lire des livres n'attire pas d'ennuis.

translation.en: I will get in trouble, huge trouble. If I do what I wanna do.
translation.fr: J'aurai de gros ennuis. Si je fais ce que je veux.

translation.en: What's that?
Spells, magic, potions.
Hang on.
Are you some kind of… witch?
- You are a witch! - A witch in training.
Although Grandma tells me
translation.fr: Même si ma mamie me dit

translation.en: that I probably know more than some born witches.
translation.fr: que j'en sais plus que des vraies sorcières.

translation.en: This is so organized.
I made it so there's separate places for toys, potions, reading,
translation.fr: Pour que mes jouets, mes potions, mes livres,

translation.en: sleeping, and dress- up.
translation.fr: et mes vêtements aient chacun une place.

translation.en: Oh, and this is my doll collection.
translation.fr: Et voici ma collection de poupées.

translation.en: Meet Ellie and Esmerelda. Periwinkle. Quite the gossip.
translation.fr: Voici Ellie et Esmeralda. Pervenche. Une commère.

translation.en: And this is Annie and Sophie.
Is this a mummy?
I'm gonna build a pyramid to bury her in.
translation.fr: Je vais construire une pyramide pour l'inhumer.

translation.en: Nice!
So, what spells can you do?
I just learned the spell that makes you dance forever.
translation.fr: J'ai appris le sort qui t'oblige à danser.

translation.en: And I'm working on a spell that makes you invisible.
translation.fr: Et je travaille sur un sort d'invisibilité.

translation.en: Let's do it, right now! I would, except I need a dead frog.
translation.fr: - Faisons-le maintenant. - Il me faut une grenouille morte.

translation.en: It'd be mean to kill a frog. That's why I'm building a pond.
translation.fr: - C'est mal de les tuer. - Grâce à ma mare,

translation.en: So, a frog will move in and die of old age.
translation.fr: une grenouille viendra y mourir de vieillesse.

translation.en: That's pretty smart.
This part is really secret.
My witch's robe.
Whoa, Nelly!
Watch this.
It's my spell book.
This is so amazing.
Where did you get this? My grandma sent it to me.
translation.fr: - Où tu l'as eu ? - Cadeau de ma mamie.

translation.en: Is she a witch- in- training too? She says that she isn't, but I have my doubts. Hmm.
translation.fr: - Elle est apprentie ? - Elle dit que non, mais j'en doute.

translation.en: And… my magic wand!
That's just a stick It's a wand.
translation.fr: - C'est un simple bâton. - Une baguette.

translation.en: And you better watch out, or I'll use it on you.
translation.fr: Et prends garde ou je m'en sers sur toi.

translation.en: I'll make you dance forever!
translation.fr: Tu ne t'arrêteras plus de danser !

translation.en: You just gave me the best idea.
translation.fr: Tu m'as donné une super idée.

translation.en: Let's do the spell on Nancy.
She deserves it for being such a booger- head.
translation.fr: Elle le mérite, elle fait rien que m'embêter.

translation.en: So, a spell would be perfect.
Especially, if we made you look like a real witch.
translation.fr: Surtout si tu ressemblais à une vraie sorcière.

translation.en: I am a real witch.
No offense, but you don't look it.
Do you have any face paint, fake blood,
translation.fr: Tu as du maquillage, du faux sang,

translation.en: glue, maybe some scissors?
translation.fr: de la colle et des ciseaux ?

translation.en: Um, Bean never came in. Do you know where she is? I told you, she ran away from home.
translation.fr: - Juju n'est pas rentrée. Tu l'as vue ? - Tu vois ? Elle a fugué.

translation.en: Could you go find her, please?
Are those mine?  Why?
What is the point? You're not even gonna punish her.
translation.fr: À quoi bon ? Tu ne la puniras pas.

translation.en: She'll be cleaning her room all afternoon. Now go find your sister.
translation.fr: Elle rangera sa chambre de fond en comble. Trouve-la.

translation.en: Fine. I wouldn't wear these anyway.
translation.fr: Bien. Je ne les porterais pas, de toute façon.

translation.en: - Did you make them or something? - No. I didn't make them.
translation.fr: - Tu les as fabriquées ? - Non. Pas moi.

translation.en: I made them.
Just remember what we'll be saying in another 15 years.
Fifteen years, we'll be basking somewhere
translation.fr: Quand on se la coulera douce

translation.en: - on a wonderful beach, alone. - Ooh, I like that idea.
- Oh, my gosh. - Margaritas.
♪ We'll be alone ♪
♪ No babies, no kids ♪
- ♪ It's happy ♪ - ♪ All happy ♪ - ♪ It's optimal ♪ - ♪ We're good ♪
translation.fr: - Le bonheur - Y a pas mieux

translation.en: ♪ No babies in the house no more ♪ ♪ No babies in the house no more ♪
translation.fr: Plus de bébés dans la maison

translation.en: - ♪ No kids, no babies ♪ - ♪ I know, baby ♪
- You hungry, baby? - ♪ No babies ♪
You were right.
I do look amazing.
You're going to scare Nancy to death.
- Hey, Bean- breath! -
Stop running away this minute, Bean! Mom wants you home! Now!
translation.fr: Reviens ici illico, Juju ! Maman veut que tu rentres ! Exécution !

translation.en: How soon can we do the spell? Right away. Just need… worms.
translation.fr: - Tu peux faire le sort quand ? - Là. Il me faut des vers.

translation.en: Worms? No problem.
Let's go get my trowel.
We're on a worm mission.
Oh, yeah.
Let's do this.
- Whoa. - Oh! Hello.
Would that be my eye shadow?
And my trowel?
Yup! Hi! I'm Bean.
translation.fr: - Oui. Moi, c'est Juju. - La voisine.

translation.en: - From across the street. - I know.
translation.fr: - Oui. Moi, c'est Juju. - La voisine. Bonjour, enchantée. Je suis Katrine, la maman de Zoé.

translation.en: Hi, it's nice to meet you. I'm Ivy's mom, Katrine.
translation.fr: Bonjour, enchantée. Je suis Katrine, la maman de Zoé.

translation.en: So, when did you two start playing? We're not playing. We're on a mission.
translation.fr: - Vous jouez ensemble ? - Non. On est en mission.

translation.en: Oh, what a nice idea.
Have fun.
Yes!
Why do moms always say nice? Nice is boring. I'm glad you're not nice.
translation.fr: Ce mot, chic, c'est vieux jeu. T'es pas chic, tant mieux.

translation.en: I'm glad you're not nice too.
Bean!
This is the final warning bozo- face. Mom wants you in… here
translation.fr: Dernier avertissement, débilos. Maman veut que tu rentres

translation.en: now!
Bean, you're in so much trouble.
translation.fr: Tu vas avoir de gros ennuis.

translation.en: We can't go that way. We have to get the worms for the spell before Nancy sees us.
translation.fr: Pas par là. Trouvons les vers avant que Ninon nous voie.

translation.en: Come home now!
- But there's no way out there. - Bean?
You like secret passageways.
Well, this is top secret.
No one will see this passageway to my house.
Really?
There are 12 houses in Pancake Court,
and I have discovered a secret passageway through all of them.
translation.fr: et j'ai découvert un passage pour toutes les traverser.

translation.en: Follow me, and we can get from your backyard
translation.fr: Suis-moi, et on pourra quitter ton jardin

translation.en: to the Pit of Doom undetected.
translation.fr: pour rejoindre le Trou sans être vues.

translation.en: There we will get the worms, sneak up on Nancy, and do the spell.
translation.fr: On y trouvera des vers et on jettera un sort à Ninon.

translation.en: Follow me.
This is Poopy Yard.
I call it no- man's land.
Sergeant Bean, there are mines ahead. How do we proceed?
translation.fr: Sergent Juju, terrain miné. Que fait-on ?

translation.en: We have to move fast.
Step exactly where I step.
I've been hit! Ugh!
Soldier down!
Stay with me, Bean. Stay with me.
translation.fr: Reste avec moi, Juju. Tiens bon.

translation.en: This is enemy territory.
Stay sharp.
Easy.
We got this.
Who lives here?
Who's the worst possible person who could live here?
translation.fr: La pire personne qui pourrait vivre ici ?

translation.en: An ogre!
They're the worst possible.
They're dangerously aggressive and territorial.
translation.fr: Ils défendent leur territoire avec hargne.

translation.en: And they eat children.
Tidbits, tidbits, yummy, tasty tidbits.
translation.fr: Des petites bouchées, de délicieuses petites bouchées.

translation.en: Oh! Look at what's cooking in my pot.
translation.fr: Regarde ce qui mijote dans ma marmite.

translation.en: - - Dottsy, we're going to eat well tonight.
translation.fr: Dottsy, on va se régaler ce soir.

translation.en: - Little girl soup. Mmm… -
I don't like being soup.
translation.fr: J'aime pas être dans la soupe.

translation.en: We better keep moving before she sees us. The way out is behind that statue.
translation.fr: Ne traînons pas ou elle va nous voir. On va sortir derrière cette statue.

translation.en: Bean.
Bean!
Do the invisibility spell! - You've got the frog. Do the spell. -
translation.fr: Lance le sort d'invisibilité ! T'as la grenouille.

translation.en: Hurry! She's going to see us!
- I need lilac! Lilac! - Hurry. Hurry!
translation.fr: - Il me faut du lilas ! - Vite !

translation.en: Oh, Dottsy. Don't eat the frog.
You two. You stay right there. Right there.
We had a frog.
Who else could it be except for… you. Whatever you are.
translation.fr: Et tu es accompagnée par… toi. Quoi que tu sois.

translation.en: I'm Ivy, I live over--
Well, Ivy, do you know anything about trespassing?
translation.fr: Zoé, tu connais le principe d'intrusion ?

translation.en: Your friend Bernice does not seem to.
Sorry, it was an emergency. Hmm. I don't think you're sorry at all.
translation.fr: - Désolée, il y avait urgence. - Tu n'es pas désolée.

translation.en: Though you will be because there are consequences
translation.fr: Mais sache qu'on ne vient pas

translation.en: for coming uninvited into other people's yards.
translation.fr: sans invitation dans le jardin des gens.

translation.en: - Ew, ew! Poo on you. -  I feel sick.
I think I might throw up.
Yes, that's the emergency I was telling you about.
translation.fr: C'est l'urgence dont je vous parlais.

translation.en: Mm… Hmm. Nice try.
translation.fr: C'est l'urgence dont je vous parlais. Bien tenté.

translation.en: You…  both come in the house while I call--
Don't you dare.
Go! Run!
Out of my yard! Now!
That's what we were doing!
Dottsy!
- - Ivy, that was awesome.
Be wary.
Sometimes allies, sometimes foes.
translation.fr: Ils peuvent être alliés ou ennemis.

translation.en: Do you also build pyramids?
Did you take all of my dirt? You can't have all of it.
translation.fr: Vous avez pris toute ma terre ?

translation.en: It is pretty nice.
Homeschooled.
Lucky.
This is Ivy, by the way. Ivy, this is Travis and Trevor. They're twins.
translation.fr: Voici Zoé. Et voici Travis et Trevor. Ils sont jumeaux.

translation.en: But it's important that you respond to us as individuals.
translation.fr: Mais tu dois nous parler individuellement.

translation.en: Hi, Travis. Hi, Trevor.
Hey there, Ivy.
- Bye, Travis. Bye, Trevor. - Bye, Travis. Bye, Trevor.
- Bye. - Bye.
As soon as you go through, watch out for the Pit of Doom.
translation.fr: Une fois qu'on aura traversé, gare au Trou de la mort.

translation.en: And crawl along the fence to the playhouse,
so we can figure out whether it's safe or not to get the worms.
translation.fr: on verra si la voie est libre pour les vers.

translation.en: Nancy might be watching, so stay low.
translation.fr: Ninon monte peut-être la garde, donc reste baissée.

translation.en: And yes, we do build pyramids.
translation.fr: Et oui, on construit des pyramides.

translation.en: Did you want one with smooth sides or with steps?
translation.fr: Tu en veux une lisse ou à degrés ?

translation.en: Steps, please.
There's the pit.
There's the playhouse.
I've looked everywhere, Mom! Bean's vanished.
translation.fr: J'ai regardé partout, maman ! Juju a disparu.

translation.en: Bean?
So, the first thing we do is get the worms,
translation.fr: Première chose à faire : récupérer les vers.

translation.en: then figure out a way to creep up on Nancy.
translation.fr: Puis il faudra réussir à surprendre Ninon.

translation.en: Here's the spell. Dance Everlasting.
Dance and squiggle, worm a- wiggle--
Just say the magic words and throw the worms. It's pretty simple.
translation.fr: Prononce la formule et jette les vers. Simple.

translation.en: Okay, so how many worms, exactly?
Twenty worms, exactly.
Dottsy?
Dottsy!
Dot--
I just saw worms here. This is a worm place.
translation.fr: J'ai vu des vers ici. Il y en a souvent.

translation.en: Speak to us, oh, wiggly worms.
translation.fr: Parlez-nous, ô, vers qui se tortillent.

translation.en: Reveal where you are hiding.
Try there.
- Ivy, you're a worm whisperer. -
translation.fr: Zoé, tu murmures à l'oreille des vers.

translation.en: Did I ever mention how much Nancy hates worms?
translation.fr: Je t'ai dit combien Ninon déteste les vers ?

translation.en: I love them.
They're so wet and slimy,
and they can regenerate parts of their bodies.
translation.fr: et des parties de leurs corps repoussent.

translation.en: - And we got lots of tomatoes… - …corn, zucchini.
translation.fr: Des tomates, du maïs, des courgettes.

translation.en: Dad's coming. Hide in the jungle!
translation.fr: C'est papa. Cache-toi dans la jungle !

translation.en: - - A viper!
A cobra!
A viper cobra.
The most dangerous kind!
Hurry!
Over here, I'd try to plant something new.
And this year was corn and--  Oh, yum.
Yeah, yeah, yeah. You'd be surprised at how quickly they grow.
translation.fr: Si vous saviez combien ça pousse vite.

translation.en: And… here we are.
Uh… Raccoons?
Maybe. Or bears.
I've heard tell there's a grizzly problem out here.
translation.fr: Il paraît qu'un grizzly pose souci.

translation.en: What's my mom doing here? My dad invites everyone over for vegetables.
translation.fr: - Maman, ici ? - Papa montre ses légumes à tout le monde.

translation.en: My mom says that he has a green thumb.
translation.fr: Maman dit qu'il a la main verte.

translation.en: But I've checked a bunch of times, and it looks normal to me.
translation.fr: J'ai vérifié, mais elle est normale.

translation.en: …aspect of life. I don't make the rules.
- Can they see us? - No way.
I don't know why kids have to run through the garden.
translation.fr: Pourquoi les enfants courent dans le jardin ?

translation.en: That is way more fun than running through the yard.
Guess what? I just thought of how we can sneak up on Nancy.
Stay out of my string beans, bears, or be ready to face show- and- tell.
translation.fr: Évitez mes haricots verts, les ours, ou je vous donne une leçon.

translation.en: Danger ahead. Follow me.
Do not understand.
Move like a shadow. Move like a ghost. Move like a ninja.
translation.fr: Déplace-toi comme une ombre. Comme un fantôme. Comme un ninja.

translation.en: Understood.
Dottsy?
Dottsy!
Dottsy?
You should probably take some tomatoes, too.
- That'd be so great. - Excuse me. Have you seen my Dottsy?
translation.fr: - Avec plaisir. - Avez-vous vu mon Dottsy ?

translation.en: He's having a moment in my tomatoes.
translation.fr: Il se soulage dans mes tomates.

translation.en: Dottsy, did you chase those bad little girls?
translation.fr: Tu as pourchassé les vilaines fillettes ?

translation.en: - Have you met Mrs. Trantz? -
- No, not yet. But, um… - She's very…
- She seems interesting. - Uh, ye- yeah, interesting.
translation.fr: - Elle a l'air intéressante. - C'est ça.

translation.en: That's not fake crying. That's real crying.
translation.fr: Elle ne fait pas semblant de pleurer.

translation.en: That's so weird. Nancy never cries.
translation.fr: Trop bizarre. Ninon ne pleure jamais.

translation.en: Maybe she's sad because you ran away, and it's all her fault.
translation.fr: Elle s'en veut peut-être pour ta disparition.

translation.en: Maybe she's sorry for being mean. And for never playing with me anymore.
translation.fr: Ou pour avoir été méchante et parce qu'elle ne joue plus avec moi.

translation.en: I bet she wishes she was a better sister.
translation.fr: Elle veut être une meilleure sœur.

translation.en: Now she just sits by the window waiting for your return.
translation.fr: Et elle attend ton retour à la fenêtre.

translation.en: I wouldn't mind a sister like that.
I must go!
Bean is out there!
Somewhere!
I must find her and bring her home!
translation.fr: Je dois la retrouver et la ramener !

translation.en: - Nancy. - Don't try and stop me!
It's all my fault!
We agree. It is your fault.
translation.fr: On est d'accord. Tout est ta faute.

translation.en: You should search for the rest of your life to find your sweet…
translation.fr: Toute ta vie, tu rechercheras ta douce,

translation.en: …and kind and adorable little sister.
Bean!
Maybe we shouldn't do the spell.
translation.fr: On devrait laisser tomber le sort.

translation.en: It's probably not fun to dance forever.
translation.fr: Danser sans arrêt doit être nul.

translation.en: And not stop until your feet are bloody stumps.
translation.fr: Jusqu'à avoir les pieds en sang.

translation.en: It's so not fair, Mom.
Everyone but me has them.
translation.fr: Ils en ont tous, sauf moi.

translation.en: Everyone.
Even some of Bean's stupid friends.
translation.fr: Même certains des amis débiles de Juju.

translation.en: We've discussed this a million times, Nancy. You'll get them when you're 13.
translation.fr: On en a discuté un million de fois. Tu attendras d'avoir 13 ans.

translation.en: She's not crying about me. She's crying about having her ears pierced.
translation.fr: Elle pleure, car elle veut se faire percer les oreilles.

translation.en: You're a booger- head! You know that?
Booger- heads don't wear earrings! Booger- heads just wear boogers!
translation.fr: Une sale morveuse n'a pas les oreilles percées !

translation.en: Mom!
I found Bean!
You are so busted!
translation.fr: Je vais te faire ta fête.

translation.en: Stop! I command you to leave Bean alone!
translation.fr: Arrête ! Je t'ordonne de laisser Juju.

translation.en: I hope you're ready to dance forever!
Until the day you die!
Do the spell.
Is that a magic wand?
It is your doom.
Are you pretending to be some sort of… witch?
translation.fr: Tu te prends pour une sorcière ?

translation.en: She is a witch. A witch- in- training.
Dance and squiggle, worm a- wiggle, long as you live, you'll always jiggle!
translation.fr: Danse, vers qui se tortillent, tant que tu vivras, tu te remueras !

translation.en: You're doing a spell.
I'm so scared.
Stop making fun of my friend.  Your friend?
translation.fr: - Ne te moque pas de mon amie. - Ton amie ?

translation.en: I thought you said she's the boring girl who wears headbands and reads at recess.
translation.fr: La fille rasoir qui porte des serre-têtes et lit à la récré.

translation.en: Prepare to dance forever!
What? No! Stop it! Get them off of me! Get them off!
translation.fr: Quoi ? Non ! Arrête ! Enlève-moi ça ! Enlève-les !

translation.en: Oh! Get them off!
She's… dancing!
Oh no. I'm out of worms.
translation.fr: Non. Je n'ai plus de vers.

translation.en: Run!
I am going to kill you!
- Nancy! Sweetie. -
She's still dancing.
The spell worked!
- - Dottsy, no. Stay away from those terrible children.
Get me out of this pit!
Look! Bean's pit did catch something.
translation.fr: Le trou de Juju a marché.

translation.en: Honey, are you okay?
I don't like dirt!
No dessert and no TV for a week?
translation.fr: Privée de dessert et de télé ?

translation.en: If that's what consequences are, it's not too, too bad.
translation.fr: J'assume les conséquences, c'est pas si mal.

translation.en: I don't think your mom was that mad.
translation.fr: Ta mère n'était pas vraiment remontée.

translation.en: Mom, help.
Nancy, come on. Baby, come on.
- Get up. -
And Dad didn't seem too mad either.
Upsidaisy. You've had quite the day.
translation.fr: Vous avez vécu une sacrée journée.

translation.en: - - All right.
Yeah, just give me a little boost here.
Use your legs. Yeah, use your legs. There you go.
I knew the pit would catch something, but how come Nancy stopped dancing?
translation.fr: Je savais que le trou marcherait, mais Ninon ne danse plus.

translation.en: Isn't it a forever spell?
Yeah, but we didn't have 20 worms, so it only half worked.
translation.fr: On n'avait pas 20 vers, il n'a marché qu'à moitié.

translation.en: We'll have to do it again.
translation.fr: On n'avait pas 20 vers, il n'a marché qu'à moitié. Faudra remettre ça.

translation.en: What if we do the dancing spell on Mrs. Trantz?
translation.fr: Et si on lançait le sort sur Mme Trantz ?

translation.en: We can do it on the people who keep the dog in the Poopy Yard.
translation.fr: Sur les gens du Jardin des crottes.

translation.en: Imagine if they had to dance forever around poop!
translation.fr: Imagine s'ils devaient danser autour des crottes !

translation.en: Excuse me, but your plans for tomorrow may not include
spells on neighbors, terrorizing your sister,
translation.fr: de jeter des sorts, terroriser ta sœur,

translation.en: dog poop, worms, or Pits of Doom. Is that clear?
translation.fr: les crottes, les vers ou de creuser un trou. Compris ?

translation.en: It's almost time for supper. Do you wanna walk Ivy home? - Yes! -
translation.fr: - On va dîner. Tu raccompagnes Zoé ? - Oui !

translation.en: You know what's so weird? I did use to think you were boring.
translation.fr: Tu sais le plus bizarre ? Je te trouvais rasoir.

translation.en: I thought you were boring.
I thought all you ever did was read.
translation.fr: Je pensais que tu lisais sans arrêt.

translation.en: I thought all you ever did was run around making noise.
translation.fr: Je pensais que tu faisais du bruit sans arrêt.

translation.en: Do you really not like headbands?
No way!
Are you sure?
I'm sure.
See you tomorrow?
And the day after that. And the day after that.
Bye, Bean!  Bye, Ivy!
Did you win, Leo?
No, but I was great.
That bathroom is haunted.
translation.fr: Cette salle de bains est hantée.

translation.en: Sometimes it's easier to feel the ghost.
It's like a cold wind passing right through you.
translation.fr: On sent un courant d'air froid qui nous traverse.

translation.en: I am honored to welcome you to curriculum night.
Where is Bean off to?
You can bet she's up to something nefarious.
Hide!
Where's your hall pass?
Detention!
Hello, my lovelies.
And marker.
♪ Tell me the things you let me know ♪ ♪ No need to rush, we'll take it slowly ♪
It's a tomato.
♪ The difference in us is hard to prove ♪ ♪ Guess I just have to get To know you, but… ♪
Yeah.
Oh, it looks like I'm crying.
♪ That makes us laugh ♪
Cut! Nice.
- ♪ I think we do get along just right ♪ -
♪ Not too far There's a place just for us two ♪
